Enter the unit from your private access alley into the main living space which features a large kitchen with eat-in bar, convenient half bath, 10+ foot ceilings, and large floor-to-ceiling windows that let in tons of natural light. The kitchen has tons of storage, high-end quartz countertops and modern subway tile backsplash with plenty of counter space for all your cooking and entertaining. title: This beautiful 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home
description:
Rittenhouse square location and private gated parking! This beautiful 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home is defined by style, elegance and charm. Located in a classic brownstone on pine st., the building was meticulously renovated in 2015 to ensure all of its former character was maintained, while making room for four (4) fully renovated contemporary units. Unit a, which comes with its own private parking, is the largest of the four units and is perfectly situated at the front of this historic building featuring beautiful large windows that infuse the first floor and large master bedroom with light year-round and offer an an idyllic, classic philadelphia view of the lovely tree-lined block. Plus, it is in a hard-to-beat location just a few minutes away from the theatre district & rittenhouse square, yet still on a quiet and peaceful residential street, across the street from the best place in the city to get a cappuccino! 1508 pine st. Boasts ample living & dining spaces for all of your family & friends to enjoy. Enter through the main level, which has a spacious living area and dining room, a beautiful brick fireplace and a lovely powder room. Upstairs there are two generous bedrooms, each on their own level for optimal privacy and both equipped with their own private, luxurious tiled bathrooms with luxurious tile tub surrounds, tile floor and custom vanity. Down on the lower level, you will find a large family room and designer kitchen with travertine floors throughout. The kitchen features sleek, modern cabinetry, quartz countertops, and new premium appliances including a viking microwave, viking gas range, whirlpool refrigerator, and bosch dishwasher. High ceilings and plenty of windows flood this home with light and give it a bright, open and airy atmosphere, while classic architectural features like the brick fireplace, natural wood accents, and beautiful intricate moldings give it a warm and inviting feel. Not to mention the private gated parking located in the back of the property, laundry in-unit (+ brand new samsung washer & dryer) and an additional storage locker in the basement make this home as convenient as it is luxurious. Don't miss out on this incredible space close to rittenhouse square park, broad street, jefferson, upenn, and the cityã¢â€â™s finest restaurants, boutiques, and more! Recent updates by the current owners include new paint throughout the home, refinished hardwood floors throughout, resurfaced fireplace, new bathroom cabinetry, new washer & dryer, new quartz countertops and brand new state of the art kitchen appliances!

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment, Wood Floors, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:
* Oversized floor plan
* Large closets
* Wood floors
* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* All utilities included
Please make an appointment to tour with ResMate, our chatbot concierge on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com. You may take a guided tour in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

title: furnished studio apartment 4200 block of Sansom St
description: Furnished studio apartment available 9/3/22. The apartment is near many amenities such as several grocery stores, pharmacies, transportation wifi eateries and many restaurants. The apartment is within 10-15 minutes walking distance of University of Pa, Drexel University, and the Restaurant School. The neighborhood is safe and is regularly patrolled by the University City Police, who are located 1 1/2 blocks from the residence. The apartment rents for 875.00 which includes all utilities. Complimentary wifi is also available. The first and last months rent (1750.00) is due upon lease signing, and the 875.00 security deposit is due on move in date. A deduction of 58.32 will be given for the 1st and 2nd days of September. A one year lease is preferred, but owner is willing to do a 9 month lease. Laundromat located less than 5 min walking distance from the building. This apartment would be a good fit for an interning student, graduate student, or a student who likes a quiet environment etc. This is a smoke free building. Also, the apartment rental is for one occupant. There is also a no pet policy. .

description:
515 S. 27th Street
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
